description: Numerator of lowest terms fraction from division of a highly composite number (1) by its predecessor.
comments: Successive fractions are 2/1,2/1,3/2,2/1,2/1,3/2,4/3,5/4,2/1,3/2,4/3,3/2,2/1 a(n) is frequently A054482(n)+1, though not for example for n=26
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 31 2000
